veteran.description: Veteran Object being submitted in Claim

flashes.description: Attributes that describe special circumstances which apply to a Veteran.

currentlyVAEmployee.description: Flag if Veteran is VA Employee.

currentMailingAddress.description: Current Mailing Address Object being submitted.

addressLine2.description: Additional Address Information Veteran resides in.

addressLine3.description: Additional Address Information Veteran resides in.

country.description: Country Veteran resides in.  Value must match the values returned by the "/countries" endpoint on the [Benefits Reference Data API](https://developer.va.gov/explore/benefits/docs/benefits_reference_data?version=current).

type.description:
Type of residence Veteran resides in.  
 If value is "INTERNATIONAL", then "addressLine1", "city", "country", and "internationalPostalCode" are required.  
 If value is "DOMESTIC", then "addressLine1", "city", "state", "country", and "zipFirstFive" are required.  
 If value is "MILITARY", then "addressLine1", "country", "militaryStateCode", "militaryPostOfficeTypeCode", and "zipFirstFive" are required.

changeOfAddress.description: A Change of Address Object being submitted.

beginningDate.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD the Veteran changed address. Date must be in the future if change is temporary.

endingDate.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD the changed address expires, if change is temporary.

addressChangeType.description: Temporary or Permanent change of address.

addressLine2.description: New Additional Address Information Veteran resides in.

country.description: New country Veteran resides in. Value must match the values returned by the "/countries" endpoint on the [Benefits Reference Data API](https://developer.va.gov/explore/benefits/docs/benefits_reference_data?version=current).

zipFirstFive.description: New zipcode (First 5 digits) Veteran resides in.

zipLastFour.description: New zipcode (Last 4 digits) Veteran resides in.

type.description:
New type of residence Veteran resides in.  
 If value is "INTERNATIONAL", then "city" and "internationalPostalCode" are required.  
 If value is "DOMESTIC", then "city", "state", and "zipFirstFive" are required.  
 If value is "MILITARY", then "militaryStateCode", "militaryPostOfficeTypeCode", and "zipFirstFive" are required.

homelessness.description: Object describing Veteran Homelessness if applicable.

pointOfContact.description: Object describing Homeless Veteran Point of Contact.

pointOfContactName.description: Point of contact in direct contact with Veteran.

primaryPhone.description: Phone Number Object for Point of Contact.

areaCode.description: Area code of Point of Contact.

phoneNumber.description: Primary phone of Point of Contact.

homelessSituationType.description: Current state of the veteran's homelessness.

otherLivingSituation.description: For a 'homelessSituationType' of value 'other', please provide additional comments on the living situation.
For a 'homelessnessRiskSituationType' of value 'other', please provide additional comments on the living situation.

servicePeriods.description: Identifies the Service dates and Branch the Veteran served in.

enum: Army Air Corps or Army Air Force

activeDutyEndDate.description: Date Completed Active Duty.  If in the future, 'separationLocationCode' is required.

separationLocationCode.description: Code for the facility the Veteran plans to separate from.  Required if 'servicePeriod.activeDutyEndDate' is in the future. [Code values available here.](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/vets-api/blob/master/modules/claims_api/lib/claims_api/separation_location_code_values.json)

confinements.description: Used if the Veteran was ever a prisoner of war.

title10Activation.description: Include if the Veteran is currently activated on federal orders within the National Guard or Reserves

anticipatedSeparationDate.description: Anticipated date of separation. Date must be in the future.

title10ActivationDate.description: Date cannot be in the future and must be after the earliest servicePeriod.activeDutyBeginDate.

alternateNames.description: List any other names under which the Veteran served, if applicable.

disabilities.description: Any current disabilities or symptoms the Veteran is claiming are related to their military service and/or are service-connected.

specialIssues.description: The special issues related to the disability. Note :: Only add special issues that you are certain about.  Incorrect special issues can lead to processing delays or denials. secondaryDisabilities.description: Identifies the Secondary Service Disability information of the Veteran.

disabilityActionType.description: The status of the secondary disability.

treatments.description: Identifies the Service Treatment information of the Veteran.

startDate.description: Date Veteran started treatment. Date must be after the earliest servicePeriods.activeDutyBeginDate.

endDate.description: Date Veteran ended treatment. End date must be after the start date.

treatedDisabilityNames.description: Names of any disabilities for which the Veteran was treated.

items.description: Name of Disabilities Veteran was Treated for.

center.description: VA Medical Center(s) and Department of Defense Military Treatment Facilities where the Veteran received treatment after discharge for any claimed disabilities.

name.description: Name of facility Veteran was treated in.

servicePay.description: Details about Veteran receiving Service Pay from DoD.

waiveVABenefitsToRetainTrainingPay.description: Is Veteran Waiving benefits to retain training pay.

waiveVABenefitsToRetainRetiredPay.description: Is Veteran Waiving benefits to retain Retiree pay.

militaryRetiredPay.description: Retirement Pay information from Military Service.

willReceiveInFuture.description:
Will Veteran get Retiree pay in future?  
 If true, then "futurePayExplanation" attribute is required.

payment.description: Part of DoD paying Retirement Benefits.

enum: Army Air Corps or Army Air Force

futurePayExplanation.description: Explains why future pay will be received.

enum: Army Air Corps or Army Air Force

receivedDate.description: Approximate date separation pay was received.

directDeposit.description: Financial Direct Deposit information for Veteran.

accountType.description: Veteran Account Type (value is case insensitive).

bankName.description: Provide the name of the bank where the Veteran wants the direct deposit.

claimantCertification.description: Determines if person submitting the claim is certified to do so.

standardClaim.description: A value of false indicates the claim should be processed as a Fully Developed Claim.

applicationExpirationDate.description: Time stamp of when claim expires.  If not provided, value will be set to 1 year in the future from current day.

autoCestPDFGenerationDisabled.description: Allows you to bypass the auto PDF generation and instead upload the Disability form itself through Support Documents.

claimDate.description: Date (or Timestamp with TimeZone) when claim is being submitted to the VA. Date cannot be in the future. UTC TimeZone is assumed unless otherwise specified.
